#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iomanip>
#include <vector>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;
pair<double,string> A[55];
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    for(int ii=1;ii<=t;ii++)
    {
        vector<double>v;
        cout<<"Case "<<ii<<":\n";
        int n,q;
        cin>>n>>q;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>(A[i].second);
            stringstream ss;
            ss.clear();
            ss<<(A[i].second);
            ss>>(A[i].first);
        }
        sort(A,A+n);
        for(int j=1;j<=q;j++)
        {
            cout<<"Scenario "<<j<<":\n";
            long double p;
            string s;
            cin>>p;
            for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
            {
                if((p+(long double)1e-3-A[i].first)>=0.0)
                {
                    int pp=(int)((p+1e-3)/A[i].first);
                    p=p - (long double)pp*(A[i].first);
                    cout<<A[i].second << " " << pp<<"\n";
                }
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
